make_campaign_description: Every member of the organization will be more conscientious towards the goal and strive for the collective success of the collective when they jointly identify and map out the way to achieve them.
message_master_description: You should use social media to connect friends. When communicating in fCampaign, you can connect friends and get info updated about their life even though you live thousand miles away from them and donâ€™t have time to meet.
friendly_description: Break the dividing wall, create openness and friendliness among members.
clear_statistics_description: Quality objectives become clearer, each member will understand and control the process in a consistent manner. Reduce costs through good control, the capacity of the process will be improved.
share_images_description: This is a safe place to share pictures. You can choose to share your photos with the whole group or just with family and close friends
description_web: This website shares information, creates workgroups and discussions for people who share the same ideal and purpose .... And when you join this site you can share your hands. charity projects for religious organizations, orphanages or other community activities
user_use: There were {value} people joining this site
intro: Let's join campaigns and make new friends to get information.
